mapper.select: SELECT b.b_no , b.title , b.user_id , b.reg_date , t.views FROM board b INNER JOIN trav_board t ON b.b_no = t.trav_b_no WHERE b.user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM follow WHERE follower_id = #{user_id} ) OR b.user_id IN ( SELECT id FROM users WHERE grade_level = 6 ) OR b.user_id = #{b.user_id} ORDER BY b.b_no DESC

SELECT b.b_no , b.title , b.contents , b.user_id, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emoji e WHERE e.b_no = b.b_no AND e.emoji_record>0) total_emoji ,b.reg_date ,t.views FROM board b INNER JOIN trav_board t ON b.b_no = t.trav_b_no WHERE b.b_no =#{b.b_no}
mapper.update: update trav_board set views= views+1 where trav_b_no=#{trav_b_no}
mapper.select: SELECT b.b_no , b.title , b.contents , b.user_id, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emoji e WHERE e.b_no = b.b_no AND e.emoji_record>0) total_emoji ,b.reg_date ,t.views FROM board b INNER JOIN trav_board t ON b.b_no = t.trav_b_no WHERE b.user_id=#{b.user_id} order by b.b_no desc
